summary.span: 使用 命名空间，可以将自定义升级行为编程入 ClickOnce 应用程序。

span.span: With the namespace, you can program custom upgrade behavior into your ClickOnce application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间中的关键类是。The key class in this namespace is . 你可以测试你的部署使用有可用的更新是否或方法; 后, 一种方法将引发成功完成后的事件。You can test whether your deployment has an available update by using either the or methods; the latter method raises the event when it has successfully completed. 返回有关此更新，例如其版本号以及它是否为当前用户所需的更新的重要信息。 returns important information about the update, such as its version number and whether it is a required update for current users. 如果有可用的更新，你可以通过安装它或; 后一种方法将引发事件更新的安装完成后。If an update is available, you can install it by using or ; the latter method raises the event after installation of the update is finished. 对于大型更新，可以接收通过进度通知和事件，并使用中的信息以通知用户下载状态。For large updates, you can receive progress notifications through the and events, and use the information in to notify the user of the download status. 此外可以使用下载大型文件和按需程序集。You can also use to download large files and assemblies on demand. 这些文件必须标记为"可选"在部署的应用程序清单中，以便它们不会在安装时进行下载。These files must be marked as "optional" within the deployment's application manifest, so that they are not downloaded at installation. 可以通过在应用程序的持续时间下载文件随时或方法。You can download the files at any point during the application's duration by using the or methods. 通过提供的事件处理程序被加载到内存之前，您可以下载的程序集上的事件类。You can download assemblies before they are loaded into memory by supplying an event handler for the event on the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练：在设计器中使用 ClickOnce 部署 API 按需下载程序集](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Downloading Assemblies on Demand with the ClickOnce Deployment API Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59a0dd5f-1cab-4f2f-b780-0ab7399905d5).
